On Thu, 26 Sep 2002 DanielBook@... wrote:

> <PRE>Crud.. anybody have an idea how I can get a version of it then?

The amount of space on the Yahoo group doesn't prevent a windows version.
A windows release could easily be hosted on Snowstorm's site. The only
problem is that the current release doesn't compile for Windows yet. I'm
currently working on getting it running on Windows, but it'll be at least
a few days before its available for that platform.

For now, if you know anyone running Linux, Openglad would run on their
comp. I'll post to the list as soon as the Windows binaries are released,
but until they are, 0.9 will be the only Windows version of Openglad.


- Zardus
